staticherobanner.description: If you have questions, we have answers.
staticherobanner.title: Delta SkyMiles FAQs

terms_landing.heading: FAQs
terms_landing.termslist:
[{"termstitle":"Who can earn miles as part of the SkyMiles partnership between Ohio Natural Gas and Delta?"\,"termsdescription":"

ONG customers in good standing who are on any of ONG's published residential or commercial price plans and are also SkyMiles members are eligible to start earning miles.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"How many miles will I earn?"\,"termsdescription":"

You will be awarded two miles for every dollar of ONG supplier gas charges on your monthly bill (excluding sales tax and one-time charges such as late fees). Plus\, if you are a Delta SkyMiles Medallion® member\, Delta will apply an additional mile for every eligible dollar.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"When will my miles be posted to my Delta SkyMiles account?"\,"termsdescription":"

Bonus miles will be awarded after 30 days of continuous active gas service with ONG. Ongoing/monthly miles will be posted to your SkyMiles account up to 4 weeks after each monthly bill date\, provided you remain in good standing in the SkyMiles program.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":"true"},{"termstitle":"I am not a Delta SkyMiles member. How do I become a Delta SkyMiles member so I may start earning miles as an ONG customer? "\,"termsdescription":"

It's easy to sign up for Delta SkyMiles. Simply visit delta.com/skymiles.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"I have multiple ONG Accounts. May I earn miles for each ONG account?"\,"termsdescription":"

Yes. Simply fill out the form above for each of your ONG accounts. You may elect to have each of your ONG accounts distributed to a single or multiple SkyMiles accounts as you wish.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"May I direct the miles that I earn through ONG to someone's SkyMiles account other than my own? "\,"termsdescription":"

Yes. Simply enter the SkyMiles member name and account information above\, or call ONG Customer Care toll-free at 1.888.466.4427.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"Do the miles earned through Ohio Natural Gas count toward Medallion status as Medallion® Qualification Miles (MQMs)?"\,"termsdescription":"

Unfortunately\, they do not.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"How can I check my Delta SkyMiles account balance?"\,"termsdescription":"

Visit delta.com/skymiles to check your balance.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"If my ONG miles are not posting to my SkyMiles account who do I contact? "\,"termsdescription":"

Please contact us at 1.888.466.4427 and we will check on the status. However\, if you have recently signed up\, please keep in mind that bonus miles will be awarded after 30 days of continuous active service with ONG and it may take up to 4 weeks after each monthly bill date before ongoing/monthly miles start posting to your SkyMiles account\, provided you remain in good standing in the SkyMiles program.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""},{"termstitle":"I have a question not listed here. Whom can I contact?"\,"termsdescription":"

Call ONG Customer Care toll-free at 1.888.466.4427\, or email us at DeltaQuestions@onlyong.com.

\\n"\,"textIsRich":""}]
